parameters.name: UserPreferenceValue
parameters.description: Value to toggle as defined in swUserPreferenceToggle_e

parameters.name: OnFlag
parameters.description: True to toggle the value on, false to toggle the value off

title: IModelDoc2.SetUserPreferenceToggle
signature:
System.Boolean SetUserPreferenceToggle( 
   System.Int32
UserPreferenceValue
,
   System.Boolean
OnFlag
)

parameters.name: UserPreferenceValue
parameters.description: Value to toggle as defined in swUserPreferenceToggle_e

parameters.name: OnFlag
parameters.description: True to toggle the value on, false to toggle the value off

returns: True if the toggle is successful, false if not
remarks:
This method is equivalent to interactively setting document properties in the SOLIDWORKS Design software. See
System Options and Document Properties
for details.
